COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x134
STRING: Two days had passed since the lecture with Grave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x140
STRING: I heard from Fal yesterday that she had a place that Lise
and I could talk, as promised.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x158
STRING: She told me briefly about her part time job last time we
met, but I had bigger things to worry about at that time,
and didn't ask about any specifics.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x178
STRING: It turns out that on top of her classes at school, Fal also
works part time at a trattoria called Copert, where
Asino and I happened to eat at just last week.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19a
STRING: The same trattoria that I was heading to right at this
moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a6
STRING: I had suggested at first that a place without too many
people might have been better, but Fal chose the
trattoria as no one would be able to hear what we were
talking about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c6
STRING: Another reason was that Fal had to work, and was
apparently unable to take long breaks.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dc
STRING: It seems that she had also considered Sunday, but she
took into consideration my wish for it to be as soon as
possible.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f2
STRING: The way she was sensitive to others like that always
impressed me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x200
STRING: Either way, after two o'clock, I was able to spend an
hour or so with Lise, after the lunch time peak when Fal
was able to take a break for an hour or so.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x222
STRING: I had thought at one point that it would be just the two
of us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22e
STRING: But, I was unsure whether Lise would be able to talk to
me openly, and felt that things would probably have
gone smoother with Fal there too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24e
STRING: [Chris] “Alright, I'm heading out.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x282
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay, see you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x298
STRING: I had told Phorni about some of what had happened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a4
STRING: I didn't have much choice, as she had been pressing me
about the fact that I hadn't been my usual self.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ba
STRING: I was the cause of everything this time, no doubt about
it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d0
STRING: Regardless of whether Lise was or wasn't going to
partner up with me, I wanted to make sure I apologized
to her properly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e6
STRING: And, if it were at all possible, to solve the problems that
she was facing...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x318
STRING: [Phorni] “C'mon, no more gloomy faces!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32e
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x360
STRING: [Phorni] “If things go well, you'll have yourself a partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x376
STRING: [Chris] “That's not what I'm worried about.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38c
STRING: Phorni's positive words had cheered me up a little.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x398
STRING: The clock showed that it was almost two.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a4
STRING: The trattoria was only a few minutes away on foot, but I
left quickly as I didn't want to be late.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fe
STRING: It took me less than five minutes to reach my
destination.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x414
STRING: Looking through the window at the clock inside, I found
that I was still five minutes early.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x42a
STRING: Fal should have already been inside, which meant that
all that was left was to wait for Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x440
STRING: We were supposed to be meeting inside the trattoria,
but if possible I wanted to say something to her when it
was just the two of us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x46c
STRING: [Lise] “Umm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x482
STRING: I heard a familiar voice from behind me when I was
peering inside the trattoria.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x498
STRING: I immediately turned around, and greeted Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a4
STRING: [Chris] “Morning, Lise...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e0
STRING: [Lise] “G-Good morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f6
STRING: It went without saying, but Lise seemed to be quite
composed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x50c
STRING: Four days had passed since that incident.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x518
STRING: [Chris] “Listen... There's something I need to say.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x536
STRING: [Lise] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x54c
STRING: [Chris] “I'm really sorry about what happened. I know it's
not much of an excuse to say that I had no idea, so... I
guess the only thing I can do is apologize... I'm
really sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x592
STRING: [Lise] “It's... Okay, please don't lower your head.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c0
STRING: What
happened was... All my fault.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d6
STRING: [Chris] “At the very least, I should have asked you first...
If I hadn't been so pushy, none of it would have
happened.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x612
STRING: [Lise] “That's not true... Like I said, uh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x628
STRING: Lise started to become flustered, in the way that she
always did.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x634
STRING: Making her explain herself like this was not what I had
wanted.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x64a
STRING: In any case, it seemed important for us to go inside and
discuss everything with Fal, so that we could both
maintain our composure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x660
STRING: [Chris] “Lise, let's go inside.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x692
STRING: [Lise] “Y-Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a8
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... And one more thing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d4
STRING: [Chris] “It's good to see you again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x742
STRING: It seemed that the peak time had well and truly finished,
as there were a number of empty tables.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x758
STRING: But having said that, over half of the tables had
customers, and it was far from quiet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x76e
STRING: It seemed that we wouldn't have to worry about being
overheard, just as Fal had said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x784
STRING: At a glance, it didn't seem that there were any students
from school here, either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b4
STRING: [Fal] “Over here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ca
STRING: It seemed Fal was already on her break, as she was in
her casual clothes when she called us over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e0
STRING: We sat at a table for four, with Lise and Fal sitting with
their backs to the wall, and me across from them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7fe
STRING: [Fal] “Would you like something to drink?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x814
STRING: Fal suggested drinks to us, as somewhere to start I
suppose.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x83c
STRING: [Lise] “I'm fine...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x852
STRING: [Chris] “Me too...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x884
STRING: [Fal] “＊sigh＊

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b2
STRING: In that case, I'll just get something for
myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8be
STRING: Fal shot me an unimpressed look, and scoffed jokingly..

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d4
STRING: She ordered herself a cup of coffee, and gently pushed
a glass of water across the table to each of us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x910
STRING: [Fal] “Chris, you wanted us to talk about Lise today,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x930
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x978
STRING: [Fal] “In that case, how about I start?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x98e
STRING: She wasn't directing her question to anyone in
particular, and continued speaking before receiving an
answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a2
STRING: [Fal] “It's just that... I've seen Lise in that kind of
situation several times before, that's all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9de
STRING: [Fal] “And every time, I try to ask her about it,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa16
STRING: but she
never wants to talk.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa3e
STRING: [Lise] “I'm s-sorry...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa70
STRING: [Fal] “But I really want to help solve the problem, you
know? So Lise, if you talk to us, we might be able to
work out a solution together.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xab0
STRING: At that moment, Fal looked me in the eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xabe
STRING: [Chris] “...I also want to hear about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad4
STRING: Now wasn't the time to be apologizing repeatedly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae0
STRING: So I responded, taking on Fal's words as if they were my
own.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaec
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf8
STRING: [Chris] “But, if you don't want to talk about it right now,
you don't have to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb44
STRING: [Chris] “We don't mind waiting until you feel it's okay to
talk about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb64
STRING: It may not have been the kind of problem that could be
solved by just talking about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb7a
STRING: But then again, maybe it could.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb86
STRING: I personally did not think so.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb92
STRING: I could still remember the callous gaze of the students
when they left the cenacolo.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xba8
STRING: In which case, what should we have done?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb4
STRING: What could we have done?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc0
STRING: [Chris] “Of course, if you tell us, I...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbea
STRING: I shifted my gaze to Fal, and saw her nod to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc00
STRING: [Chris] “Fal and I intend do everything we can to help
you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc50
STRING: Lise listened to what we had to say, her eyes looking
down at her lap.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc5c
STRING: Why was it that the people around her treated her that
way?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc68
STRING: It was true, I had wanted to know the reason why.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc74
STRING: If we knew what it was, there may have been
something we could change.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc80
STRING: For example, if the reason was something about Lise,
then she could change.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc98
STRING: But, I seriously doubted that Lise was the problem.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca4
STRING: Which meant, that it was the people around her that
were to blame.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb2
STRING: But even if we squeezed it out of her, there wouldn't be
anything we could do, and by making her speak, there
was a possibility we'd be hurting her again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd2
STRING: Of course, it was possible that she would feel better
simply by talking to someone about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce8
STRING: Sometimes troubles were best shared.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf4
STRING: However, it would truly have meaning only when Lise
decided to do it of her own accord.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd0c
STRING: And then...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd22
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, and also, I hope that we can continue
rehearsing in the Old Wing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd6e
STRING: [Lise] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd84
STRING: [Chris] “I enjoy our ensembles, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd9a
STRING: And, she needed somewhere she could go to escape.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda6
STRING: I had seen Lise sing happily, numerous times.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb2
STRING: But it was just not right that she was singing on her
own, in an empty place like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc8
STRING: So, from the bottom of my heart, I wanted to continue
doing ensembles with her there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe08
STRING: [Lise] “But Chris, you...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe1e
STRING: [Chris] “I...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe3c
STRING: [Lise] “You don't have time to be doing such things.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe52
STRING: [Chris] “That's true...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe70
STRING: [Lise] “So, please don't concern yourself with me. If you'll
excuse me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe9e
STRING: It was unlike her, but her words were firm and clear.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeaa
STRING: Saying nothing more, she then got up to leave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeb6
STRING: [Chris] “Lise!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee8
STRING: [Lise] “Excuse me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf0e
STRING: For just a split second she stopped, but then continued
towards the door without looking back.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf24
STRING: When I stood up to go after her, Fal grabbed me by the
hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf3a
STRING: And for some reason, she shook her head sadly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf80
STRING: [Fal] “Chris, I think we should give her some time to
herself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf96
STRING: [Chris] “Why...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb4
STRING: [Fal] “If she doesn't want to talk about it right now, she
doesn't have to... Wasn't that what you said?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfd4
STRING: [Chris] “That was different.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1006
STRING: [Fal] “I think for Lise, it's the same thing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1034
STRING: But, I think I
understand why you said that. You thought she needed
time, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1054
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1086
STRING: [Fal] “Then, I think that it's now that she needs time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x109c
STRING: [Chris] “You're... Probably right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10b2
STRING: I repositioned myself in my seat, and tried to relax.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10da
STRING: [Fal] “Why don't you have some water?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10f0
STRING: Doing as Fal said, I brought the cup to my mouth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10fc
STRING: Cold water traveled down my throat, sending a chill into
my body.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1108
STRING: After settling myself a little, I decided to continue the
discussion with Fal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x111e
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry about before... It might have been better
in the end if we had just squeezed it out of her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1150
STRING: [Fal] “It's okay, you said what you felt, so maybe it's best
that way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1170
STRING: [Chris] “Lise seemed like she was afraid... And I just...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x118e
STRING: [Fal] “Really, it's okay. More importantly... Shall I
continue?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ae
STRING: [Chris] “What do you mean...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11cc
STRING: [Fal] “I know a little bit about the reason why the other
students ignore her, and that kind of thing... I've looked
into it before.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11f6
STRING: [Chris] “But, just before you said...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1228
STRING: [Fal] “I lied.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1256
STRING: But I think we have the same view on this.
If you're going to find out, you want it to be from
her directly, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1276
STRING: [Chris] “I...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a8
STRING: [Fal] “Since it seemed like you've been spending a lot of
time with her recently, I thought that things might have
been a little different now, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ea
STRING: I guess it was
still too soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f6
STRING: [Chris] “I see... So I guess you were thinking the same
thing, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1328
STRING: [Fal] “I guess so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x133e
STRING: [Chris] “So... What was this reason you mentioned?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1370
STRING: [Fal] “Are you sure? Don't you want to hear it from her?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1390
STRING: [Chris] “I... Yeah, I guess I do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ae
STRING: [Fal] “Just wait until she feels that she's ready to tell you
about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ce
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I'll do that. But, since you know why it's
happening...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x140a
STRING: [Fal] “I know what you're thinking... But, I'm sorry.
There's nothing that I can do about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x142a
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1448
STRING: [Fal] “It's not as if they're doing something directly to
her. They just leave the room, like how you saw.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1484
STRING: [Fal] “Or no one pairing up with her in class... I've heard
of things like that happening, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a4
STRING: [Chris] “Why would they...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ce
STRING: Fal only shook her head in response to my question.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14e2
STRING: [Fal] “In any case, my feelings of wanting to do
something about it, are the same as yours. That's why I
asked you to come here today...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1502
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1534
STRING: [Fal] “You too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1562
STRING: But... I have to agree with Lise, this
really isn't the time for you to be getting involved
in this kind of thing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1582
STRING: [Chris] “You mean the partner thing...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15b4
STRING: [Fal] “Yes. What are you going to do, Chris...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ca
STRING: [Chris] “I haven't put any thought into it yet. But, if it's
possible I was thinking... Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1606
STRING: [Fal] “I had a feeling you would say that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x161c
STRING: [Chris] “But, I guess I can't ask her now, with the way
things are.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1632
STRING: I said this in a joking tone, but it was true.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1664
STRING: [Fal] “But... You're going to have to start thinking about
it sooner or later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x167a
STRING: Fal spoke in exactly the same way Torta or Ms. Cordell
would have.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1690
STRING: [Chris] “I guess you're right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c2
STRING: [Fal] “So, what are you going to do, Chris? I don't mean
about the partner thing,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16fa
STRING: I mean about Lise...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1706
STRING: [Chris] “For the time being, I think I'll go to the Old
Wing again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1738
STRING: [Fal] “I thought you'd say that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x174e
STRING: [Chris] “Is something wrong...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1780
STRING: [Fal] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1796
STRING: Fal's face suddenly became serious, and she spoke in a
firm tone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17c8
STRING: [Fal] “What are you going to do about your girlfriend?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17de
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x181c
STRING: Why did Fal know about Arie?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1828
STRING: Actually... No, that wasn't the issue right now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1834
STRING: Fal was right.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1840
STRING: Lise was starting to take up too much of my heart.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x184c
STRING: Even if I was part of the reason that Lise got hurt, if I
became too involved with her, it was possible that I
would end up hurting Arietta as a consequence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x186c
STRING: And by thinking this... I realized the truth of the matter,
that I was getting too preoccupied with Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c4
STRING: [Fal] “And on top of that, I have heard some rumors
about her that were not very flattering.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18da
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x190c
STRING: [Fal] “I don't believe them, but rumors like that don't
start without reason.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x192c
STRING: [Chris] “What kind of rumors...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1942
STRING: Putting the topic of Arietta into the back of my mind for
the time being, I was finally able to respond.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1974
STRING: [Fal] “I... I can't say, I'm sorry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19a2
STRING: But, as I said before,
they all painted her in a very unflattering light.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19c2
STRING: [Chris] “Alright. So?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19f4
STRING: [Fal] “So you're still going to go to the Old Wing for
her?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a2c
STRING: There's... something that she's hiding from you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a42
STRING: [Chris] “She's hiding something from me? Ah, I guess
you can't say what that is, either.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a7e
STRING: [Fal] “Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a94
STRING: [Chris] “This is starting to get kind of complicated. What
are you getting at, Fal?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ad0
STRING: [Fal] “To be honest, I don't think you should get any
more involved in this than you already are.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1af0
STRING: [Chris] “Why...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b0e
STRING: [Fal] “Like I said before, right now isn't the time for you
to be getting involved in something like this, is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b2e
STRING: [Chris] “What do you mean, ‘something like this?’”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b60
STRING: [Fal] “I'm sorry, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b76
STRING: [Chris] “I mean, in that case what happens to Lise?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ba8
STRING: [Fal] “I'll do something about that. My graduation recital
is just a solo performance, so I can decide when and
how I spend my time to rehearse.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bda
STRING: [Fal] “Of course, it would work out fine if you'd just pair
up with me, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bfa
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c2c
STRING: [Fal] “Sorry, it's not really the time for jokes, is it? And...
Not only that, but there's the issue of the rumors, and...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c56
STRING: Fal started to mumble a little.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c62
STRING: [Chris] “The thing that she's hiding, is it important?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c80
STRING: [Fal] “Yes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cae
STRING: Actually, to you, it might not seem like such
a big deal at all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cdc
STRING: But if it were someone else, I would
probably recommend not getting involved.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cf2
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d24
STRING: [Fal] “...And then there's the issue of your girlfriend.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d3a
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d6c
STRING: [Fal] “I'm going to ask you again, but are you still going
to involve yourself with Lise?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1de0
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e0c
STRING: I answered in earnest.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e18
STRING: I definitely needed to think about Arietta, too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e24
STRING: But... I could still clearly remember how Lise looked
when she was singing so happily.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e3a
STRING: In the beginning, I may have thought that she had a
beautiful voice, nothing more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e46
STRING: And that I wanted to do an ensemble with her, innocent
things like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e5c
STRING: But now, I was already involved in her life.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e68
STRING: And because of that, Lise had ended up getting hurt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e74
STRING: I couldn't just go and abandon her now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e9c
STRING: [Fal] “I see... In that case, there's nothing else for me to
say.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eb2
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ee4
STRING: [Fal] “Why do you say sorry?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1efa
STRING: [Chris] “Because you gave me all this advice, and then

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f2c
STRING: [Fal] “No no, don't worry about it. I was just kind of
testing you, anyway... But if that's your answer, then
perhaps I can just leave all this in your hands.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f56
STRING: [Chris] “What do you mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f88
STRING: [Fal] “This problem of Lise's has been bothering me for a
long time, but I haven't been able to find much time for
it since I'm in the third year. But, if you're that
concerned about her,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 1f88
STRING: [Fal] then I was thinking that perhaps I'm not needed.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fb2
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fd0
STRING: [Fal] “I still intend to do what I can to help, however.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fe6
STRING: [Chris] “Got it. In any case, I'll keep going to the Old
Wing to see her. I think the first step is going to be
seeing her, and actually talking.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 1fe6
STRING: [Chris] “But I promise I won't just bail out
before we reach some kind of resolution.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x202c
STRING: [Fal] “Good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2042
STRING: Fal then looked at the clock, as if she had just
remembered about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x206a
STRING: [Fal] “Well, that was quick.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2098
STRING: I only have thirty minutes
for my break, so I'm going to have to head back.
So, Chris, if you'll excuse me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ae
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, wait a second.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20c4
STRING: I casually took the bill from Fal's hand when she was
about to head back into the kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20da
STRING: [Chris] “I'll get this. I mean... Its only one cup of coffee
after all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2102
STRING: [Fal] “Hee hee. In that case, why don't you have lunch
while you're here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2118
STRING: [Chris] “That might be a good idea. It wouldn't be fair
for three of us to be here for half an hour and only have
this to show for it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2138
STRING: I responded cheerfully, dangling the bill about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x214c
STRING: [Fal] “That's true.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x217a
STRING: Oh... Do you mind if I say one last
thing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2186
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Sure. What is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21b8
STRING: [Fal] “You shouldn't be so trusting of people.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21ce
STRING: [Chris] “I'm sure Lise's not like that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21ec
STRING: [Fal] “Maybe. But, even I have a thing or two that I'm
hiding, you know? Well, see you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x220c
STRING: Fal finished up things with a joke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2218
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks a lot... Really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2232
STRING: Fal smiled and shook her head, and then went back into
the kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2248
STRING: I was assuming that Lise wouldn't come to school
tomorrow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2254
STRING: But on Monday, it was quite possible.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2260
STRING: Just like today, there was no need to try and squeeze
anything out of her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2276
STRING: We would just do our ensembles, and she would sing
the song she loves.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2282
STRING: Right now, that's all we could do.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x228e
STRING: But, if one day she decided to open up, then that was
the day I would help her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22f8
STRING: [Phorni] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x230e
STRING: I wanted a little time to myself to think.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x231a
STRING: Perhaps Phorni had noticed how I felt, as she asked me
nothing, and simply sat in her usual spot.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2330
STRING: Her sensitivity toward me right now made me very
happy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x233c
STRING: If the need arose, I planned to tell her about everything,
but it wouldn't have been worth saying anything until I
had organized my own thoughts.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x235c
STRING: Lise's defensive attitude, and the words that Fal couldn't
say.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2368
STRING: And there was Lise and Arie, and my feelings toward to
two of them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2374
STRING: I doubted that I would be able to find answers any time
soon.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2380
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry Phorni, I think I'm just going to get some
sleep.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23aa
STRING: Not waiting for a response, I lay down and let myself
drift off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23b6
STRING: Sooner or later, I would have to make things clear.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23c2
STRING: And in order to do that, I would need to see Lise again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23ce
STRING: Even if it meant that finding an answer would hurt
someone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2402
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2418
STRING: Fal may have been right.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2424
STRING: I might not have been able to find my way out if I got
any more involved.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2430
STRING: I felt with a sense of clarity a certain risk with Lise, one
that I had also felt with Torta in the past...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2462
STRING: [Fal] “I think it's for the best. So, don't worry, I'll do what
I can to help Lise myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2482
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24a0
STRING: [Fal] “Don't be. All I did was give you advice as a friend,
because I thought that if you followed my advice, things
would just work out better for you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24ca
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24e8
STRING: [Fal] “You don't need to thank me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2516
STRING: Oh... But, you know what?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2522
STRING: [Chris] “Hm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2554
STRING: [Fal] “You can pay me back when we both become
professional musicians someday.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x256a
STRING: [Chris] “Me, become a professional...? I'm not sure that
day will come.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2588
STRING: [Fal] “Really? I think you've got it in you. So you know,
when the day comes...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25a8
STRING: Fal laughed as she said this, speaking in a tone that was
hard to decide whether it was a joke or not.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25be
STRING: Fal then looked at the clock, as if she had just
remembered about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25e6
STRING: [Fal] “Well, that was quick.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2614
STRING: I only have thirty minutes for my break, so I'm going to
have to head back. So, Chris, if you'll excuse me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x262a
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, wait a second.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2640
STRING: I casually took the bill from Fal's hand when she was
about to head back into the kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2656
STRING: [Chris] “I'll get this. I mean... Its only one cup of coffee
after all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2692
STRING: [Fal] “Hee hee. In that case, why don't you have lunch
while you're here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26a8
STRING: [Chris] “That might be a good idea. It wouldn't be fair
for three of us to be here for half an hour and only have
this to show for it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26c8
STRING: I responded cheerfully, dangling the bill about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26dc
STRING: [Fal] “That's true. Well, I'll see you around.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2700
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Would you mind if I asked you one last
thing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2732
STRING: [Fal] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2748
STRING: [Chris] “You mentioned my girlfriend earlier, but... How
did you know about her?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2784
STRING: [Fal] “Well, you two are always together, aren't you?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27b2
STRING: I think her name was Tortinita?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27e0
STRING: We're in the same vocal course, but I've never had
classes with her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27f6
STRING: It was Torta that she was talking about...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2802
STRING: But, I had to thank her for simply reminding me about
that fact.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2818
STRING: I had no choice but to leave the Lise issue in Fal's hands.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2824
STRING: I couldn't allow myself to do anything that would hurt
Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2838
STRING: [Fal] “Okay, I really have to get going.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x284e
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks a lot... Really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2868
STRING: Fal smiled and shook her head, and then went back into
the kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x287e
STRING: With that I decided to stop thinking any further about
Lise, and headed home.
